I absolutely loved this game, it was the most original and entertaining game I've played since Half-Life 2.  I have to admit I bought it years ago but got a bit stuck early on as there's no real tutorial so gave up.  I picked it up again and decided to persevere and am so glad I did!  Things I love:

Completely original concept and implementation
Fabulous characterisation and genuinely entertaining plot
Never repetitive, new challenges/puzzles are introduced throughout
Challenging but never too difficult - the clues are there, and every time I thought I was stuck I was able to come back to the game and see something I'd missed
Very long and varied - not just endless puzzles/rooms but plenty of travel/action as well to break the monotony

Overall just an excellent excellent game and a steal at £7!
Nostalgia strucks, and it strucks good

Одна из лучших игр-головоломок. В ней прекрасно всё: сюжет, юмор, звуковое оформление (звуки активирования портала изумительны; конечная песня выше всяких похвал), визуальное оформление и, конечно же, лучший кооператив.

Wow! That was a fun ride. Story is awesome and dark! Gameplay is unique, fun, and challenging! Coop mode is also pretty fun yelling at your partner to do this and that and both finding out that actually you are dumb and not smart. If you have not tried out this game, you are missing out on a lot. Go get it!

Portal 2 completely revolutionizes everything that the original game accomplished with a new highly engaging story. The mix of comedy and character development have surpassed anything this series has ever seen, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in an experience that is far greater than just puzzle-solving. Linking character interactions and dialogue that is triggered based on where you are looking is a phenomenal design that takes full advantage of player behavior. I was so surprised to see how much bigger environments were, making new concepts like gels and excursion funnels really fun to interact with. There are so many surprises throughout this experience and learning more about GLaDOS definitely expands on more than just her character. On top of this, the cooperative multiplayer mode gives a great deal of replay value, especially when exploring workshop content. If you want to play a masterpiece in storytelling that fits right in with the Half-Life universe, then do it for science...you monster. Game on.

Possibly the best game on the planet,
Fantastic voice acting, With an extremely memorable performance from Stephen Merchant, Visuals that still hold up well to this day, and give the game style, and jokes that land, with excellent writing. The soundtrack is also brilliantly composed, not too noticeable, but giving important and exciting moments more impact.
A gem, despite it's actual length leaving something to be desired, the game here is one that just can't be passed on.

This game is amazing..
With a story campaign that has multiple hours of amazing gameplay and puzzles that will keep you on the edge of your seat the entire time, Characters that you can have a real relationship with, and brand new puzzle elements that add so much to the puzzles.
There's also co-op, It's a much shorter campaign but with emotes and brand new variety in the puzzles, it's definitely a worthwhile experience.
Then there's the perpetual testing initiative, the best thing in the entire Portal series, Anybody who owns portal 2 can make their own test chambers, the custom maps in portal 2 are indescribable and can only be experienced yourself, after 9 years this game still holds up today, a definite recommend from me.

It's a nice alternative to shooters. A game where you have a chance tp think.
Also, it's verly long-lasting, so you will get long entertainement for your money.

I have been a fan of this game since it came out.  The story and puzzle gameplay are one of a kind (save Portal 1).  I enjoy the new puzzles (not just the shoot portal here pop out there).  The best part is how the story rolls out as you play with no slow down, no cut scenes, and tons of hidden extras strewn throughout the levels.

An amazing sequel to an amazing game. Improved physics, amazing new characters which you may even grow fond of, fun and interesting puzzles, the lovable classic characters, and many more things. The game has new and interesting mechanics which make the game more fun, but not harder. This game is excellent, and has an ending which makes you shed a tear. A must-play game. +9999999/10.

The best puzzle game ever made. Even if you hate puzzles you will love this game. ALOT. The objective of this game is to get out of the Aperture Science facility (4km below the surface) which is pretty damn big. The writing is superb and you will spend hours finishing tests, given to you by GLaDOs, from one chamber to the other and also explore the facility, which is now completely in ruins.
8.9/10
